_meanings:
{@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) 
Special mention or exclusive 
specification, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} where with or 
without a query something is affirmed
for the denial, expressed or 
understood, of something else 
similar to it; (this figure is 
particularly striking when it is based on
a {#Sleza#} or pun); {#yasmin mahIM SAsati#} 
{#citrakarmasu varRasaMkarAScApezu guRacCedAH#} &c. or
{#yasya nUpurezu muKaratA vivAhezu karagrahaRaM turaMgezu#}
{#kaSABiGAtaH#} &c. K; for other examples
see <ls>S. D. 735.</ls>
